documentation.p: The recursive argument can be used to specify that the structure of the sub-directories and all files contained in sub-directories should be processed too.
If the directories do not exist on the target platform, they will be created depending on the make_dirs argument.
The selection of objects (files) to be processed is applied to sub-directories via the file_spec argument.
If sub-directories are newly created, the structure will be created inside the directory specified with the target_dir or remote_dir arguments.
